dcterms:description: The dataset consists of 1654 {claim, premise, warrant(implicit premise)} triples, used for the identification and reconstruction of implicit warrants in arguments.
dcterms:title: Argument Reasoning Comprehension Task

dcterms:creator: Filip Boltužić
Jan Šnajder
dcterms:description: This dataset contains 494 enthymemes from an online debate forum, annotated with human-generated implicit premises.
dcterms:title: Online Debate Forum Dataset

dcterms:creator: Maria Becker
Katharina Korfhage
Anette Frank
dcterms:description: This dataset contains implicit premises annotated for each argument from the MicroText Corpus, focusing on arguments in a support relation.
dcterms:title: MicroText Corpus

dcterms:creator: Chandra Bhagavatula
Ronan Le Bras

dcterms:description: The ART dataset consists of pairs of observations from narratives along with plausible explanations to be generated, aimed at the abductive reasoning task.
dcterms:title: Abductive Reasoning in Narrative Text (ART)

dcterms:creator: Nasrin Mostafazadeh
Nathanael Chambers
Xiaodong He
Devi Parikh
Dhruv Batra
Lucy Vanderwende

dcterms:description: ROCStories is a large collection of short, manually curated five-sentence stories used to evaluate commonsense reasoning.
dcterms:title: ROCStories
